website_summaries.verdict: A cheap yet sturdy alternative to Spikeball brand sets.
pros: This Slammo set is made with a sturdy PVC and is cheaper than any Spikeball set
The net holds up well after extensive use
This set comes with a carrying bag and three balls, including a larger "training" ball
cons: Rim may warp in hot temperatures
Some customers reported popped balls after some use

customer_reviews.title: Bad net - returning it!
customer_reviews.text: We played the name brand of this game at a party and the teenagers loved it. I bought this one because I liked the colors and it looked like the same thing. The balls are great - mini volleyballs. The trampoline piece itself was poorly made. The green legs seemed thin and light-weight. The main disappointment was the net itself. Cheap net with larger holes than expected. We built the unit as per the instructions and the net was loose (not like a trampoline). We tightened up the net, but it was still not as taut as it should be to play this game. Complete joke. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Swanker

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Time
customer_reviews.text: I played spikeball before and wanted to buy it but this was cheaper. So I gave it a shot, a group of us hung out for Memorial day and one kid brought spikeball and I brought this. We set up both and this was actually the favorite. The net held better and gave a better bounce. The only "complicated" part is stretching the net enough to have the balls bounce properly. That just takes practice, but it is a great game if you are looking for a challenge....it takes coordination, this isn't a game that you can hold a beer during!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Snyder

customer_reviews.title: An Attempt Was Made
customer_reviews.text: An awesome alternative to the real thing (Spike Ball which is brilliant), but it doesn't quite have the build quality of what it's attempting to be the knock off of. The balls that came with it are made out of thin plastic that deformed so badly (possibly from heat) that they drastically and negatively impact play. Also, the net is not of high enough quality construction to function like Spike Ball.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS L VAN LIEW

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality. Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Well built game using high quality plastic that holds it shape. Since the spring/bounce comes from how tightly the net is wrapped the frame, this frame holds up to even the tightest wrappings. There is a groove along the bottom which prevent the feet from twisting and falling over. This can be both a good thing and bad - if you're wanting to fold them over for flat storage. The 3 balls included are also of high quality. Overall, extremely impressed with the entire set. Everything feel of the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: TheProfessor101

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up! I am a youth director and my kids loved it! On Sunday after church we had 10 elementary kids playing and loving it! They were not playing the "official" way, but who cares, they loved bouncing the ball and catching it and it helped build community and that's why I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Canto

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cheap, flimsy and doesn't work as expected. Unfortunately I didn't try it until after my 30 day window, but wish I had spent more and bought spike ball because we have used that brand at the park and it was so fun! This thing falls apart and the net has no spring to it, so the ball doesn't rebound back to players. Do not bother.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My teenages love this game! There is no difference between this and the much more expensive version (Spikeball). The only downside is, it's not easy to take apart and put back together. So we just keep it assembled and throw it in the car to go to the beach. My friend's Spikeball is the same way, so no difference there.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It's just as good as spikeball.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on prime day, totally worth the money, even at regular price. I have played the "name brand" version of this game and there is essentially no difference between the two. As to the game itself. Super competitive and fun, a great workout and it can be played 1v1 with some small rule changes. I love it and am completely satisfied with the product. Quality is great, sturdy and good quality net. It's taken quite a beating from myself and 3 brothers. Easy setup and tear down. Not much else to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: great and portable
customer_reviews.text: Super fun, takes a hot minute and maybe a helper to get the net spread out enough to get a good bounce. Very fast to take apart, though. Make sure to pump up the balls for first use - they came mostly flat. Overall super fun and portable. Very lightweight and the carrying bag made it super easy to bring to the park. Awesome game that can get very competitive or remain mostly chill if everyone wants to keep it light. Takes some practice to get the rules down though. Had to look up rules more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good competition
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for our family beach week. It appealed to adults and kids aged 8, 9, 11, and 12, who played countless lively and highly competitive games. Took them a few games to perfect the amount of force needed but is challenging enough to keep them interested. I especially appreciate that it lends itself to mixed-age teams.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Go $10 more for the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping to not spend the full $45 for name brand Spikeball and was disappointed. It is poorly made and warps easily so that the net is not a true circle any more. The net ripped and frame cracked within the first 3 months of playing. Next summer we went immediately to the store and bought the real Spikeball.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Potter

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: My Son uses it a lot with his friends at College. He said it was easy to assemble the first time, but aggravating to repeat every time he wanted to play it, so he leaves it put together and takes it with him, which he said wasn't a problem to do.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Terrible game
customer_reviews.text: This game doesn’t work. We read all the instructions, watched video on amazon, and we still can’t play. The net doesn’t pull right enough to cause a bounce. We thought maybe the needed to be inflated more...nope. Nothing we did helped with the balls bouncing off the net. We took this on a family river trip and no one was able to make it work. The kids ended up turning the net on its side and rolling the balls into it as a “bowling game”. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David & Angela

customer_reviews.title: East & Fun Outdoor Game!
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to put together, recommend pulling the net a little more than you would think so the ball bounces more easily. Also recommend heading to YouTube to watch how to play, because the instructions in word format was a little difficult to understand. We played with four people, two adults and two children and they were able to understand how to play. So fun, will purchase again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: fun and worth the price, but don't expect high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off of spike ball, duh, and its cheaper, so you can give it a try without breaking the bank. The balls and frame are fine, but the net feels like low quality and doesn't generate a lot of bounce. You'll need to stretch the net very tight over the frame taking care not to break anything and be sure to inflate the balls before you play. I suspect the game will last a least one summer for my kids as they only play occasionally and don't slam the ball that hard on the net.
customer_reviews.author: Xious

customer_reviews.title: Great value and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this over the more costly brand name version and all the boys were very happy with it. Super easy to set up and very easy to learn. I would recommend this for anyone looking for something fun to do at the beach or anywhere outside for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: great for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Slammo game set to use when we take our grandkids camping. We had our grandboys ages 5 and 9 test it out in the back yard before we hauled it to our camper. They love it! Since they are so young, we played a modified version of the game. Played it one afternoon, then they asked to play it again after dinner. Both are highly involved on baseball teams. We think this game will help them develop fielding and catching skills. Thanks so much for the great product. We look forward to many more happy family times. God Bless and Stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: Rick E Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced this with a real spike ball set. This one is not worth your time. The net doesn’t tighten evenly since the hooks are not distributed evenly around the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S. Kato

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is all we did all summer. It is so much fun! Super easy to pack away into the string bag and easy to set up. Such a fun game for people who aren’t athletic and really athletic people as it really puts people on an equal playing field. And it ends up being really hilarious if you mess up. This one is so much cheaper than the name brand and it’s almost exactly the same. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Moran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect timing
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to keep my son busy and to get outside during quarantine. He loves this game and has gotten creative and adds challenges and new ideas all of the time. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: TMR78

customer_reviews.title: Would be a lot of fun if my family wasn't terrible at it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the game and we've seen it played by the pros. It takes about 10 seconds to realize that you are not a pro. In fact, the game is hard. We had fun figuring that out though. It's difficult to get the net as tight as I think it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch and play. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was so easy. It’s pretty straight forward. This game is the best game. I’m not particularly athletic but boy oh boy does this game get your juices pumping. And by that I mean your heart because it’s a mini workout for me lol. It’s also so fun to watch other people play. I don’t know about other people but my family takes games like this incredibly seriously, so it’s fun to watch people get competitive over hitting a ball on a trampoline. Great gift for guys by the way! I got this for my husbands birthday and personally think it was a win.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY Boyd

customer_reviews.title: The most fun beach game EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an EXTREMELY fun beach game! I saw tons of people playing it last year so I decided to pull the trigger. Came with everything pictures and set-up was very easy. I have used it a few times and it seems very durable. Yes it is made of plastic so you will have to be careful not to leave it in a hot car, but as long as you think it will be fine! I love the handy pouch and the fact that it came with a training ball! I can get a very nice strong tension on the net quickly and easily!
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT worth the money. It is easy to assemble, but the the cheap plastic parts make it difficult to tighten the net. We were able to play, and “slam” but the sturdiness of the frame is too light, so it keeps shifting.
customer_reviews.author: D.VIEW

customer_reviews.title: Leg broke after 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this game to my son for his birthday. We have been practicing and trying to get the hang of it and after 2 days, the leg cracked and broke when the platform was bumped. (This is an active game where the probability of people running into the platform is high...so I would expect that it could handle a little more.) I will be trying the name brand game now...
customer_reviews.author: J L F

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Great game, did look into spikeball before purchasing Slammo due to price. I would say, this has been hours of fun for the kids, and they enjoy it tons. Structurally, pretty strong plastic. I heard some people having broken their parts down the line. But seems sturdy to me. I recommend it, carrying case is always nice and keeps it organized. Takes about 5mins to setup, or less. Keep the balls up!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Close enough to Spikeball
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for a trip with my friends to the beach. When compared to the traditional Spikeball set it is very similar. However, I wish there were some simple changes that would help this set be way better. I felt the net to be cheaper and that my friends and I often had to re-tighten the net to get a better bounce. I wish there was a cheap air pump included with the set however it was nice of them to include a needle adapter for an air pump. The included bag was nice to carry the set with and everything fit well within it. Overall: Very good, however I wish net was just a little better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien Soroush

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, no issues!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't played this yet, will have to update. Opened the packaging just to see if it would be easy to put together and take apart, while on our beach camping trip. I was able to easily slide pieces together, and take them apart, no tools necessary. Suggests not traveling with it already assembled, but came with a nice carrying bag. Also came with a tip for the pump, when you need to fill the balls, but they do come inflated. Everything seems to be good quality. So far, I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper brand, decent quality, poor net
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat challenging to set up, the net is pretty uneven - tight in some spots and loose in others - resulting in the ball angling oddly when hit there. The net really isn’t tight enough (ball hit the ground when hit hard) and we tried many different ways to make it tighter (adjusting the hooks, adjusting the positioning of the net, etc). I really wanted this to work! Bummer. Returning for Spikeball.
customer_reviews.author: MEF

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift and the kids love it! They play it all the time and 4 months later it is still like new! We previously bought a similar, cheaper one from somewhere else and it broke in 3 days. This one has been played for 4 months now and holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I return the product because 2 balls wouldn’t stay inflated and the nets wasn't tight enough. I tried to readjust over and over again but it just was tight enough for the ball to bounce off. It may be a combination of the ball and the net or that my kids were young and didn’t hit hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble but kinda wonky. It doesnt sit level on a hard flat surface.... i guess on the beach or grass it wouldnt be noticed tho... Seems as though the netting might also stretch too easily but i think you could easily make it tighter by just using a piece a few inches in to strech over the hooks
customer_reviews.author: akaMomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid, cheaper option for roundnet
customer_reviews.text: This is just a solid alternative (and half the price) to the yellow Spikeball roundnet. The frame is sturdy and the net maintains its tension very well, I only had to adjust it 1-2 times per 30-min game. Being that it is the more economical choice for roundnet or "spike ball," it is a great option for people who would consider themselves novices. But as someone who has played volleyball for more than 15 years and easily picked up roundnet, it's reliable enough for competitive-level play as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Great game, half the price of competitors and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The game is excellent! I’ve been meaning to try it out and I found Slammo for half the price of other sets out there. The one thing I didn’t see in the instructions is there are clips on the outer edge that hold the net. What I didn’t know was they slide along the plastic to help spread out the net. The smaller competition ball had a crack in it, but their customer service replaced it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: csdsmallville

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my coworkers and I could do something during our lunch break and get in a little physical activity. The first day was a bit of a learning curve, but by the end of the hour we were starting to get some rallies together. We have played every day(weather depending) at lunch for the past 9 months. And after 9 months the net started to break and they sent me a new net within a few days of contacting them. I would recommend this for anyone looking for a good "backyard" game.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: A new game but not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I enjoyed the new game for the first time use, and then after a few days the second time I played it I found some issues with the net. The net was not easy to put on, so I expected it to be tight, however, it is not..... this made the balls bouncing in a loose way too... I hope it will last long enough...
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yard game!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect yard game for our family reunion!! The net and frame is sturdy, and we have already enjoyed playing!!
customer_reviews.author: jeaneencan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and stores easily
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a yard party and it was a huge hit. My 18 year old son has since brought it to the park and used it with his friends. Lots of fun and stores easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Bother
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. The net is nylon based not elastic so you can’t get it right enough to create the bounce you want.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun!! We bought it for a lake weekend and it was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: My son got this as a gift. He loves this game and all of us have given this a try. Fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great if the balls would bounce a little higher.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great but when we tried playing it the balls don't really bounce very high off the net. We even put more air in the balls and made sure the net was snug but it still didn't help so kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica B.

customer_reviews.title: Good family fun and surprisingly makes you sweat!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a family activity during the pandemic. It's great that it is so portable and it's easy to learn. Our kids really enjoyed playing. And once you get going, it actually gets you sweating! This may be hard for kiddos under 8 years old or so. I gave it a 4 rather than a 5 just because it does require some set up (straightforward but does take 5-7 minutes), and it seems sturdy enough, but lightweight plastic, so hard to know until we use it more and lug it around. Good fun all around!
customer_reviews.author: Bethlyn V Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: It might be me?
customer_reviews.text: We tried to play this game, and we couldn't get one serve or return. The ball doesn't spring off the net very well. It's not easy to serve and not easy to return. Gave up after 10-12 tries. I gotta think the 'spikeball' version is better.
customer_reviews.author: CETECH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality but missing a key part...
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble and instructions easy to read. We played a floppy version all week because our set was missing the pump. It had the needle but no pump to inflate balls... The balls were super floppy and hard to hit because it was so under inflated. The hand pump was missing from the box so we basically played bounce back/slap the smushy ball across the beach. Luckily my family thinks all ball playing is fun and we made the most fun of a deflated ball on a bouncy net!
customer_reviews.author: Prime user

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. I wish there was just a pinch more bounce in the net!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Woodhams

customer_reviews.title: Sons Love It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons, they love playing with it daily! Bought this during stay at home orders, wanting my 4 sons to stay somewhat active and entertained.... mission accomplished! They have been playing daily and look forward to playing. They learned how to play fast and they tell me it is great exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite
customer_reviews.text: A family favorite. So much fun to play for all ages. Came in a nice case to store the balls. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Frye

customer_reviews.title: Can't get balls to bounce!
customer_reviews.text: Unless we are doing something wrong, we can't get a good bounce on the balls. We have filled them as full as we can, and stretched the net as tight as we can, and I am very sorry we missed the return date on this! If the company, or others, could tell us how to get the balls to actually bounce enough, and it worked I would give it more stars. But for now we are extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: john & barb cage

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bummer.... we were sent a used product. It was covered in dirt and grass. The bottom legs are scratched. And unfortunately, there is very little bounce to the net. We have pulled it tight, it’s just not made that great. And due to the local fires in our area I missed the return window. So... we are stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: they had great customer service and sent me a knew one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the first frame I got was warped, and did not work well. However, they had great customer service and sent me a knew one. The new one was fine. No warping. My biggest concern was the quality wouldn't be as good a spikeball. But after playing on a Slammo Set and a Spikeball set, I can't really see a difference. Slammo works great and is almost half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for time away from screens for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase to keep my energetic boys busy. Super easy to set up (the kids did it themselves) and it got them away from screens for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Regina C Key

customer_reviews.title: Decent SpikeBall Set, Doesnt compare to Original
customer_reviews.text: Bought this spikeball set as a "River Set". Overall I am happy with the set, but it still does not compare to the Original Spikeball set for 60$. The ball is somewhat bigger and you can tell the quality of parts is not as great either. Ended up purchasing the real Spike Ball Set and I recommend you spend the extra 20$ and do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Olphen

customer_reviews.title: Slammo not a bad value
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Slammo vs the original Spikeball as it had Ok reviews and was cheaper. The quality is OK... not great. Pieces fit together well enough but the net really has to be worked at in order to get a good enough tension to play. And it seems we have to keep tightening as we play. The balls do deflate and need to be pumped up fairly often. We have played on grass and the beach and the game has performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: The kids and grandkids loved it. We bought it to take on vacation to the beach and had a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Fun and addicting
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you pack a small air pump and needle in the bag. Due to the fact if the balls are even a little deflated they will not bounce right, no matter how tight you make the net.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Game on!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this game! Originally, we set out for spyder ball, but came across this brand for a much more reasonable price. It's the same thing! My teenage sons who are usually 'too cool for school' have spent hours playing this game in the backyard, at the park, and even brought it on vacation to the beach. They prefer the larger training ball that came with this set, and that's something that we wouldn't have gotten with the other brand. Once you figure out how to tighten the net so the ball bounces well, it's "game on!"
customer_reviews.author: KDG teacher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and use. Super fun game to play. I highly recommend trying the game out. The only things I would upgrade: Include a small hand pump Retractable legs A better net system (attaching purposes)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Biber

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game, great for groups and all ages/athleticism
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this game. I introduced it to my coworkers and it is a great outdoor game and super simple to learn. My only qualm with this particular brand (the original brand is Spikeball), is the net seems to stretch out over time and becomes loose. There is no easy way that I can find to buy a replacement net so I would have to buy an entirely new model. Otherwise, this game is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product but the game is ok
customer_reviews.text: The net has to be stretch a lot to give the balls the correct bounce. The instructions didn't exactly give that guidance well. The net then has to hang down a lot. Not the best product but the game is ok. This is not a kids game although they tried to play it. They don't have the correct height, strength to keep the ball going.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Myers

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional customer service! I had two separate issues with my original game set. The netting snapped and I called their customer support. Within 2 days, I had my replacement and I was back playing at the beach. Later on, a friend of mine dove for a ball and landed directly on one of the green feet--breaking it. Called them again and they gladly replaced the piece even though it was a user error and not a manufacturing defect. This product is perfect for the beach or grass area and is extremely addicting. You and your friends will have a blast playing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I lost my best friend...
customer_reviews.text: It's alot of fun and easy to learn! WARNING: It can get competitive. Don't play with your friends who are overly competitive, I lost a friend because I beat him so much. We are no longer in speaking terms.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Kimberland

customer_reviews.title: Bounce isn't good enough
customer_reviews.text: This is apparently a popular game with the kids and I bought it for my Xmas party to give kids something to do...the balls just aren't bouncy enough on the net. They made do but it could be better
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: No bounce
customer_reviews.text: My family played with a good quality set at camp and so thought we would like one of our own. We went for the cost friendly version and are so disappointed. Cant get the net tight enough for good action without bending the frame. Should have returned it right away. If you want one of these games - get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: GmanR

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED The company contacted me and offered free replacement parts. The parts came quickly and were easy to replace. We haven't had any problems since. Only downside to the game is that it is a little difficult getting the net tight but otherwise great. Broke after only one time playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing game
customer_reviews.text: threw a high school grad party, people of all ages loved this game, ordered two and they were both used the entire time!
customer_reviews.author: Curlydiva

customer_reviews.title: Warped in Texas Heat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Sep'15, we gave it as a Christmas gift to our teenage son. He and I used it over Christmas then put it away in the garage until spring. It remained outside all spring and half of summer when I asked my son is he wanted to play. He said the plastic parts that make up the circle had warped due to the Texas heat! I checked myself. He was right. The circle is more egg shaped now, rendering the game unplayable. We really got only one game out of it. Any one know how to reach the supplier Gosports?
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Mike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is really difficult to put the net on. I constantly feel like I'm going to break either the net or the flimsy plastic i'm drying to stretch it on. I would have paid extra money to just have it shipped with the net permanently installed, as set up takes too much time, and no matter what I do, there always seems to be dead spots in the net.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up, doesn't bounce consistently.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an alternative to the real thing. Found it very tough to set up so you could play at all. Even with all of the tension you could possibly put on the net, you still can't get the ball to bounce consistently and as high as the real thing. Contacted the company and their response was to watch the video on how to set up. Said I did and they asked me to send pictures of what was going on. I'm pretty sure a still picture isn't going to effectively communicate that it isn't working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Spikeball
customer_reviews.text: Took a gamble on the knock off, cuz I'm a cheapo, and have been pleasantly surprised. Sturdy, easy to assemble, and no issues with the net being too loose or the balls deflating. Every bit as good as any Spikeball set I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun beach game for the family
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while for my family to get used to it. When we got it, it was a fun game to play on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Like much better than our original spike ball set
customer_reviews.text: Our original spike ball brand set broke so I ordered this one. It was cheaper and better quality than spike ball. Literally the exact same size and balls. Overall structure more sturdy. I know this one will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is not as great as I was hoping. I work at a school where I used to see the kids playing the game outside and it looked really fun. The product I got was easy to assemble, but not matter how tightly we pull the net or how much we inflate the balls, the balls don't really bounce that well off the net, so playing it isn't any fun. Disappointing. I might return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah in Austin, TX

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it! I sent this back after trying it out. The ball doesn't even bounce up and it doesn't matter how tight you have the netting you can't even play the game.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this game! Great strength on the net and legs and rim! Very comparable to the actual “Spikeball”
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Better for younger, smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6ft sons, 14 & 19, but they were disappointed, it would be better for younger & smaller kids. The net doesn’t stay tight enough to get a good bounce on the ball. Have a bicycle pump handy, the balls do not come with enough air & need to be inflated. They do send a needle for pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. We have only played it a few times so far and it has been great. It takes a little bit to get used to game and how it works, but then once things started clicking everyone was having lots of fun. Keeping the net real tight is the key to better game play. My friends who told me about this game have spikeball. I went with Slammo since it was cheaper and had great reviews too. I would give it 5 stars, but would like to see the spikeball version first to see if there are any differences. I will update my review after that.....
customer_reviews.author: Johntre

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The balls needed to be inflated and the net doesn’t give a good bounce to the balls so the kids played with it once and didn’t bother with it again.
customer_reviews.author: andrea scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Bought for my hubby's birthday on June 21. It's easy to set up, lots of fun to play, and it seems to be pretty sturdy (my 3 year old thought it was a mini trampoline and started jumping). The storage bag is big enough to hold all parts and inflated balls. So far all 9 of us have had fun with it. The oldest ones play it correctly, the younger ones play a modified version of bounce-catch, and the baby just likes to use the balls. Definitely a good value!
customer_reviews.author: momof8

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not super impressed with this game. I’ve heard that it’s a lot of fun but this one felt pretty flimsy and we couldn’t get it to work. Maybe we didn’t assemble it correctly?
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Loose net so game was unplayable
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before and it seemed only a small set of nets were not tight. Unfortunately my net didn't fit Well and was loose. The ball doesn't bounce off net. Really sad with us finally going to the beach again.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately broke very quickly beyond repair
customer_reviews.text: Bought to play with friends but I'd recommend you take your money elsewhere for a name brand version. This only lasted two days of use before pieces snapped or bent too far. It's now in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work,... poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was just the one I got, but this thing is junk. The net really never was able to get tight enough to play and the balls weren't bouncy even when inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Niles

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun! I have played with the typical brand and with this one and you cannot tell the difference! You can bring it to the beach or play in the yard. You can have family tournaments with it, we have played with people ages 10-52 and everyone enjoyed it. The games are quick and active!
customer_reviews.author: Emma P.

customer_reviews.title: Guests seem to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: We have this at the resort. Usually when a family tries it, they will use it more than once. Has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pros- plays just like the others
customer_reviews.text: Bought this version. Cons- arch bars are plastic, when set up mine was off balance and no matter how many times adjusted was crooked. Pros- plays just like the others. I like that it comes with more than 1 ball. I did return this for a different brand. However the brand I bought only came with 1 ball. If it weren't for the plastic bars and the crookedness I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: RJW

customer_reviews.title: Very similar to the SpikeBall branded sets.
customer_reviews.text: These sets really do work just as well as any of the SpikeBall branded sets. The construction is just as durable too in my opinion. I do wish the legs could be made to be spring loaded however because it would be nice to have them fold down in the event someone were to step or fall on top of the net. This would add some additional durability for sure. Otherwise, for what you pay it is bargain and you will have countless hours of fun. Easy five stars! :)
customer_reviews.author: J DelMar

customer_reviews.title: Different and fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this game for my son as one of his graduation presents...we've played it as family a few times and really enjoy it. He's planning on taking it to the dorms with him in the fall. My wife and I are 50 and the boys are 18 and 16, we may not be as fast, but there is a strong skill aspect. My biggest complaint is trying to keep the net tensioned...it seems like it needs to be adjusted every time we play. If they could figure out that problem this game would be 5* amazing
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Slammo is a slam dunk!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so we got this game to play with friends when we headed off on a group cabin weekend! It was a hit! Pretty sure every one of our friends ended up buying it! It’s good quality, the balls are nice and bright! All around great purchase! And way cheaper then the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The family loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The family absolutely loved it! Totally recommend, especially if your family is as competitive as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Fun play for all ages. We play this on the beach with our 5 and 8 year old for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Erica L. Goodnight

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old assembled this himself. He only needed someone to help him get the last of the net tight enough. They really liked playing it. It seems sturdy and the balls are good quality. The only issue has been that the net gets loose after playing and can be difficult to get tight again.
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boys won’t stop playing this game. We have had more of their friends at the house then ever lol We are thinking of getting a second one do they can have a friendly tournament.
customer_reviews.author: Larisse Heebner

customer_reviews.title: Have patience with net application
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought this was an inferior version of Spikeball (played Spikeball before and setting this game up the ball didn't go as high). But then I tried again following advice online and it worked great! Just as good as Spikeball. I got increased tension by pulling with my fingers from inward towards the rim and increased tension. I would recommend the manufacturers include further details regarding application so customers don't get frustrated as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B.

customer_reviews.title: Better then spike ball
customer_reviews.text: 14yr old son is happy with this item. He wanted spike ball after p!aging it at a friends. I researched and found not only does spike ball cost more there were problems with legs breaking easy. My son even said they broke a leg of the one at his friend's house. I read over and over this one is more durable. Works and plays just like spike ball, lower cost, &better made. A no brainer to go with slammo
customer_reviews.author: Lmdncn

customer_reviews.title: Careful, you will become addicted!
customer_reviews.text: Slammo is a blast! What I like best about Slammo is that it is as much fun for my 8 and 10 year old kids as it is for the dads at the local barbecue. I saw Slammo being played while I was on spring break with the family and had to get one. Now that summer is in full swing, I have had the chance to play quite a bit and to introduce Slammo to many people, everyone loves it. This will be a standard backyard game in the future, get one now!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Becker

customer_reviews.title: This game is a MUST!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhh. This game is THE BEST. It’s a perfect addition to a picnic, beach trip or trip to the park. The whole family enjoys playing this game. Good quality easy to set up and slick to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK if you really baby it I guess.
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about a month of moderate use, then one of the legs cracked with no obvious cause. It's now impossible to tighten the net to the recommended tension. I recommend that you spent the $20 extra to get Spikeball, which we use at work and seems to have held up a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: smcarmo

customer_reviews.title: No Bounce or fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids played for about 3 minutes and done. At $40 that is about $800/ hr for entertainment. It doesn't have any bounce, even after stretching to 2nd diameter webbing. We found no listed Pressure (PSI) recommendation for the ball.
customer_reviews.author: J_B_

customer_reviews.title: Like Spikeball with a few improvement
customer_reviews.text: The most important things is that this game is super fun, can be ultra competitive or backyard family picnic friendly. Pros: $20 less expensive than Spikeball More rugged construction makes it easier to make the net more bouncy The large beginner ball is great Cons: The five supports can't be rotated 90 degrees for easy storage The net has to be re-tighten. But that is a problem with Spikeball too 80% to 90% of the time you want to want to *set* the ball for you teammate.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Pereda

product_meta.title: GoSports Slammo Game Set (Includes 3 Balls, Carrying Case and Rules)
product_meta.description: Slammo is an action packed 2 on 2 game that is similar to volleyball, but with a smaller ball and a circular net. The rules are similar to volleyball where each team has 3 hits to spike the ball into the ankle high circular net. Teams volley back and forth until a team is unable to return the ball to the net. The first team to 21 points win. We engineered an improved design over the competition that provides 100 percent net coverage and eliminates the hated 'pocket shot'. The Slammo Set includes two competition size 9cm balls and also one 12cm training ball for beginners or younger players. The game can be quickly assembled and it fits neatly into the included backpack style carrying case. The game is a great workout and much easier to setup than full size volleyball. Recommended for ages 12+.
feature_bullets: Slammo: An exciting outdoor lawn game for kids and adults. Set includes 1 slammo target, 2 competition size balls, 1 training ball, travel carrying case and game rules

What is slammo: Slammo is an action packed 2 on 2 volleyball style outdoor game; Teams have 3 hits to bounce or spike the ball to the net fun for family and friends out on the yard, at the beach, cookouts, camping, and more

Active fun: Slammo is an engaging game that works great for just having fun and even breaking a sweat, or as cross training for many other sports plus slammo is a unique gift idea for kids, teens, and adults
Lifetime replacement warranty: GoSports is a US company with US customer support. If anything ever breaks or you misplace a part, we will replace it free, so you can buy with complete confidence

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
